channel.title: NoScript blocks local Whonix file resource in Tor Browser?
channel.description:
Looks like the latest NoScript update blocks the loading of the local Whonix file resource (pointing to forums, wiki etc.) on all security level settings in Tor Browser?
It just tries to load over and over with no luck. Hopefully that is fixable.

item.title: NoScript blocks local Whonix file resource in Tor Browser?
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
Yes, working well.

It looks like NoScript 11.0.41 fixed the problem (homepage was defunct with two versions before that i.e. 11.0.39 & 11.0.40).

Read full topic
item.source: NoScript blocks local Whonix file resource in Tor Browser?

item.title: NoScript blocks local Whonix file resource in Tor Browser?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Is this fixed in Tor Browser 10.0a5?
